name: CreateGiftCard
description:
Creates a digital gift card or registers a physical (plastic) gift card. You must activate the gift card before 
it can be used for payment. For more information, see 
[Selling gift cards](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/gift-cards/using-gift-cards-api#selling-square-gift-cards).

body.description:
An object containing the fields to POST for the request.

See the corresponding object definition for field details.

$block:
A response that contains a `GiftCard`. The response might contain a set of `Error` objects if the request
resulted in errors.

$ul: **errors**: Any errors that occurred during the request.
**balance_money**: Represents an amount of money. `Money` fields can be signed or unsigned.
**amount**: The amount of money, in the smallest denomination of the currency
**currency**: The type of currency, in __ISO 4217 format__. For example, the currency
**created_at**: The timestamp when the gift card was created, in RFC 3339 format.
**customer_ids**: The IDs of the customers to whom this gift card is linked.
**id**: The Square-assigned ID of the gift card.
